latest_revision.text:
==Results From Community Survey==

The average local hacker wants to pay around $30 for access to a facility that offers workspaces, industry level tools, classes and workshops, and storage space to work on projects.  Currently this alone will not sustain a space for the amount of people interested.

==Other Hacker Spaces==

===NYC Resistor===
* 25 dollars per hour classes
* private invite only membership
* friends of NYCR 13.37 /month
* first 9 each put in 1000 each to start
* went to 75 recently? to always kept that 3 months rent in bank
* large purchase funded by those who wanted it

===Noisebridge===
* 80/month standard
* 40/month starving hacker?
* 20/month affiliate (non member?)

===hackdc===
* 50/month

===TechShop(Commerialized Hacker Space)===
* http://tv.boingboing.net/2008/04/27-week/
* http://www.forbes.com/2008/08/13/diy-innovation-newton-tech-egang08-cz_vb_0813newton.html
* 125 a month
* 9-midnight
